Polisi Tahan Remaja Prank Pocong di Makassar karena Bawa Busur
03 Nov 2019, 20:50 by Hermawan Mappiwali
Jakarta - Polisi menangkap dua remaja yang membuat prank hantu pocong di Kota Makassar, Sulawesi Selatan (Sulsel). Satu di antaranya diproses hukum lebih lanjut karena membawa senjata tajam anak panah busur.
"(Dikenakan) pasal membawa sajam, kan bawa busur," ucap Kasatreskrim Polrestabes Makassar, AKBP Indratmoko, saat dimintai konfirmasi Minggu (3/11/2019).
"Salah satu pelaku, inisial UA kami tahan karena membawa sajam busur," kata dia.
Indratmoko mengatakan, remaja tersebut diproses hukum melalui UU Darurat Nomor Tahun 1952.
"Penanganannya khusus karena masih usia anak, kordinasi dengan P2TP2A (Pusat Pelayanan Terpadu Perempuan dan Anak)," ujarnya.
Namun kedua remaja pelaku prank pocong tersebut masih berada di posko Unit Jatanras Polrestabes Makassar. Mereka masih diperiksa polisi.
"Terkait prank-nya masih didalami, sementara belum ada yang melapor dirugikan. Masih kita tunggu," kata Indratmoko.
Kedua remaja yang belum disebutkan identitasnya itu ditangkap oleh tim Penikam Polrestabes Makassar di Jalan Banta Bantaeng sesaat setelah melakukan aksi video pranknya. Pengakuan warga sekitar ke polisi, mereka diresahkan oleh aksi kedua remaja itu.
"Memang sih pengakuannya masyarakat, kegiatannya setiap malam itu selalu menakut-nakuti dengan menggunakan (dandanan) pocong," ujar Komandan Tim Penikam Ipda Arif Muda, saat dikonfirmasi terpisah.
"Tadi malam kebetulan aksi (prank pocong) lagi, ya warga langsung melaporkan," katanya.

Police Detain Teenage Prank Pocong in Makassar for Bringing a Bow
03 Nov 2019, 20:50 by Hermawan Mappiwali
Jakarta - Police arrested two teenagers who made Pocong ghost prank in Makassar City, South Sulawesi (South Sulawesi). One of them is further prosecuted for carrying a sharp weapon with a bow.
"(Subjected) to bring a sharp article, don't you bring a bow," said the Kasatreskrim Makassar Polrestabes, AKBP Indratmoko, when asked for confirmation on Sunday (3/11/2019).
"One of the perpetrators, our UA initials are resistant because they carry sharp bow," he said.
Indratmoko said that the teenager was prosecuted through Emergency Law Number 1952.
"The handling is special because of the age of the child, coordinating with P2TP2A (Center for Integrated Services for Women and Children)," he said.
However, the two teenage perpetrators of the prong pocong are still at the Makassar Police Jatanras Unit Command Post. They are still being questioned by the police.
"Regarding the prank is still being explored, while no one has reported being harmed. We are still waiting," said Indratmoko.
The two teenagers who were not yet identified were arrested by the Makassar Police Penikam Team on Jalan Banta Bantaeng shortly after carrying out a video prank action. Recognition of local residents to the police, they were troubled by the action of the two teenagers.
"Indeed, the community acknowledges it, its activities every night are always frightening by using pocong (grooming)," said Commander of the Ipda Stabbing Team Arif Muda, when confirmed separately.
"Last night happened to be another (prank pocong) action, yes the residents immediately reported," he said.
